textBody:
Burundi's relations with its neighbours have often been affected by security concerns. Hundreds of thousands of Burundian refugees have at various times crossed to neighboring Rwanda, Tanzania, and the Democratic Republic of the Congo. Hundreds of thousands of Burundians are in neighboring countries as a result of the ongoing civil war. Most of them, more than 340,000 since 1993, are in Tanzania. Some Burundian rebel groups have used neighboring countries as bases for insurgent activities. The 1993 embargo placed on Burundi by regional states hurt diplomatic relations with its neighbors; relations have improved since the 1999 suspension of these sanctions.

Burundi is a member of various international and regional organizations, including the United Nations, the African Union, the African Development Bank and the Francophonie. Burundi is also a member of the International Criminal Court with a Bilateral Immunity Agreement of protection for the US-military (as covered under Article 98). The Swedish Minister for Integration and Gender Equality, Nyamko Sabuni, was born in Burundi.

Bilateral relations

Andorra

Both countries established diplomatic relations on May 30, 2007[http://www.mae.ad/en/bilateral-and-consular-affairs/bilateral-affairs]. 

Armenia

Both countries established diplomatic relations on 28 May 1992.

Argentina

Both countries established diplomatic relations on September 20, 1976[http://tratados.mrecic.gov.ar/tratado_ficha.php?id=3939]. 

Belgium

* Belgium has an embassy in Bujumbura.[http://countries.diplomatie.belgium.be/fr/burundi/ Embassy of Belgium in Bujumbura (in Dutch and French)]
* Burundi has an embassy in Brussels.[http://www.ambaburundi.be/ Embassy of Burundi in Brussels (in French)]

Cyprus

*Burundi is represented in Cyprus by its embassy in Geneva[http://www.mfa.gov.cy/mfa/mfa2016.nsf/All/AC68ABA3ADCF9AAFC225802900312095?OpenDocument] and an honorary consulate in Nicosia[http://www.mfa.gov.cy/mfa/mfa2016.nsf/All/A7DD705E410C803AC22580290033AFE9?OpenDocument]. 
*Cyprus is represented in Burundi by its embassy in Doha[http://www.mfa.gov.cy/mfa/mfa2016.nsf/All/B8A15E011F4D30A3C2258029002F400A?OpenDocument] and an honorary consulate in Bujumbura[http://www.mfa.gov.cy/mfa/mfa2016.nsf/All/1B9DC2259708BEBEC225802900324A2F?OpenDocument]. 
*Both countries are full members of the Organisation internationale de la Francophonie.

Georgia

Both countries established diplomatic relations on March 21, 1993[http://mfa.gov.ge/MainNav/ForeignPolicy/BilateralRelations/%E1%83%91%E1%83%A3%E1%83%A0%E1%83%A3%E1%83%9C%E1%83%93%E1%83%98%E1%83%A1-%E1%83%A0%E1%83%94%E1%83%A1%E1%83%9E%E1%83%A3%E1%83%91%E1%83%9A%E1%83%98%E1%83%99%E1%83%90.aspx]. 

Israel

Both countries established diplomatic relations in March 1995. 

Kenya

* Kenya has an embassy in Bujumbura.[http://www.kenyaembassyburundi.com/ Embassy of Kenya in Bujumbura]
* Burundi has an embassy in Nairobi.

Latvia

Both countries established diplomatic relations on May 24, 1993[http://www.mfa.gov.lv/en/policy/establishment-and-renewal-of-diplomatic-relations]. 

Lithuania

Both countries established diplomatic relations on May 17, 1993[https://urm.lt/default/en/list-of-countries-with-which-lithuania-has-established-diplomatic-relations]. 

Montenegro

Both countries established diplomatic relations on August 17, 2012[http://www.mvp.gov.me/rubrike/bilateralni-odnosi/Tabela-priznanja-i-uspostavljanja-diplomatskih-odn]. 

Romania

Both countries established diplomatic relations on August 8, 1968[https://www.mae.ro/en/node/2187]. 

Rwanda

Burundi and Rwanda dispute sections of border on the Akanyaru and the Kagera/Nyabarongo rivers, which have changed course since the 1960s, when the boundary was delimited; cross-border conflicts among Tutsi, Hutu, other ethnic groups, associated political rebels, armed gangs, and various government forces persist in the Great Lakes region.

Serbia

Both countries established diplomatic relations on 1962[http://www.mfa.gov.rs/en/foreign-policy/bilateral-issues/96-bilateral-issues/12793-burundi]. 

South Korea

Establishment of Diplomatic Relations between South Korea and the Republic of Burundi was on 3 October 1993. In 1985 October Minister of Finance Pierre Ngerngi Attends the Annual General Meeting of the IMF and the IBRD in Seoul Korea.http://www.mofa.go.kr/ENG/countries/middleeast/countries/20070804/1_24488.jsp?menu=m_30_50

Turkey

*Burundi has an embassy in Ankara[http://www.mfa.gov.tr/relations-between-turkey-and-burundi.en.mfa]. 
*Turkey is represented in Burundi by its embassy in Kampala[http://www.mfa.gov.tr/relations-between-turkey-and-burundi.en.mfa]. 

United States

* Burundi has an embassy in Washington, DC.[http://www.burundiembassydc-usa.org Embassy of Burundi in Washington, DC (in English and French)]
* United States has an embassy in Bujumbura.[http://burundi.usembassy.gov Embassy of the United States in Bujumbura (in English and French)]
